name: Brenda Douglas
text: i was told 0ne price for a vehicle and and was later told 2000 dollars more without another cost included just said he made a mistake who does that there's something dishonest about this dealership

resp.text: Ms Douglas asked our salesman the price on a van in inventory, that she had seen online, and was clearly marked on our website; our salesman mis-quoted the price, standing in the parking lot,  off the top of his head,  and immediately said he needed to verify the price online, which was marked $2,000 more...It was an honest mistake, and we regret this customer can't understand that mistakes happen..We tried to rectify the mistake as soon as we could.

name: Mary Lou Bradley
text: I would be very careful when buying a car from here. We bought my daughter a BMW. He and his wife seemed honest people. He spoke of having a strong faith. Shortly after buying the car, the 1st trip on the Interstate, we started having trouble with the car. We have had the car for a year and have replaced many parts on the car & have found out recently that the car is badly flawed. We have completely lost all the money we paid for this car for my daughter. She has cried many tears knowing we have to get her a new car & we don’t have the money, right now to get her a new car. It has been just terribly nauseating and upsetting. My advice is any car you think about buying from here, have a mechanic check it out before buying. Jordan Automotive in Daphne is a great place & he is honest. He doesn’t care if the dealer gets mad. He works for his clients. Doesn’t want his customers to get screwed over like we did.

resp.text: Mary Lou, I am sorry you had a bad experience with the BMW, we had the car checked out before you bought it, and there were no issues, I wish you would have let me know when you first began to have problems. Since we don’t have a crystal ball, we always suggest an extended warranty when buying a high mileage BMW..I am sorry for your trouble with that car, that was not our intent.

name: Jep Hill
text:
Friendly salesman & decent price.

Took my vehicle in for its first oil change to find out it hadn’t been serviced adequately prior to me purchasing. I put 3k miles on the vehicle over 6 months, and found out the oil was so low (no leaks, either) the engine already needed to be flushed. The engine also makes a noise when starting, and I’ve found out the fix is $2,500+.

You may get a good price on a vehicle from Sport Center, but, in my experience, you may not get a reliable, well-maintained vehicle to last the long-haul.

name: A Google User
text: Last week I purchased my third vehicle from Sport Center Imports. When I bought my first vehicle in 2009, I was in my mid-twenties. I had been to several dealership prior to meeting Ben and Gayle Mayfield. To this day, 10 years later I remember the condescending and patronizing interaction from several of our local dealerships.  I was once naive and financially inexperienced. I was intimidated by the large dealerships and the ‘tactics’ they employed. I felt like I was being taken advantage of, looking back, I know I was. I’ve grown up now and I know what I am doing. Still, if Sport Center Imports is in business I won’t purchase from anywhere else. It might sound odd to completely trust a car salesman, but I do.  Every time I leave their lot in my new vehicle I’m amazed at the fairness and transparency with which they operate. I’ve recommended Sport Center Imports to countless family members and friends over the years. I never miss a chance to tell someone about the positive experiences I’ve had with them. They’ve earned my loyalty and if you give them a try, you’ll no doubt feel the same way I do.

name: A Google User
text: Saw it, bought it, love it!!!  Ben & Gayle are truly the best at what they do!  No hassle, no hidden fees, NO BS!  Easiest, no pressure vehicle purchasing experience I have ever had.  The pricing, ease of financing, and extended warranty offers are unbelievable, worth every penny and their professionalism and friendliness are PRICELESS!  Thanks again Ben & Gayle,  you definitely have a client for life  when it comes to buying top quality, and low pricing on vehicles!

resp.text: Thanks for the props Dean ! We were more than happy to help guide you through the maze, without the disorientation often associated with vehicle purchases...I enjoyed getting to know you ! Thanks Again. ( By the Way, You Look GREAT in that R/T !! )

name: A Google User
text: I purchased a car from this dealership a couple of weeks ago.  The dealer was honest about the car. I even took it to a local mechanic after purchase to have it checked and they told me the car was in excellent condition.  The dealer even went out of his way to drive the car to Mississippi after I purchased it, because I was uncomfortable driving to Alabama alone to pick it up, as I had recently been in a wreck. In addition, I was late on the first day I went to look at it,  and he stayed late so I could view the car.  I was really appreciative of the extra time he took for me and my family, love the car I bought, and I highly recommend this dealership to anyone!

name: A Google User
text: Have purchased 2 cars in the past from Ben and Gayle.  Just purchased 2 more on Saturday.  Great people and fantastic selection.  I found the vehicles on the lot that my daughter and I were looking for.  The went over and above on helping me purchase the vehicles that I wanted. Thanks again!

name: A Google User
text: My husband and I had the WORST car-buying experience we have EVER had! We bought a 2015 Chevrolet Tahoe(with around 29,000 miles and some warranty left on it) from them that had been wrecked...twice. Even though this was on the car fax, this information was not disclosed to us. We hear a noise in the rear of the vehicle, so we took it to a local Chevrolet dealership. We were told that the vehicle had been wrecked, not fixed completely, and unsafe for my children and myself to be traveling in. We were advised to contact the dealer first and give them the opportunity to make it right. Sport Center Imports wanted us to bring them the vehicle and let them have another Chevrolet dealer take a look at it. We were given a vehicle to drive and was under the impression that they were going to do everything they could to make it "right". We sought legal advise. We were advised not to accept the vehicle after they had their mechanics look at it, but give them two options... either find us one that was comparable, or buy it back from us. About a week later, one of the owners contacted us to let us know the Tahoe was fixed...it was just a coil spring that needed to be repaired.  Once we explained that we did NOT want this Tahoe, and this was not we had paid all this money for, we were told they would find us one comparable. So once again, we were under the impression they were going to make it right. When they found us another one, it had over 36,000 miles which meant no warranty....BUT we decided to go ahead and purchase it and put it all behind us (after having it looked at by our own mechanics). They agreed to pay the first one off (as a trade-in), and turn around and finance the second one. They did. However,  a couple weeks later, we got a call from the owner letting us know that a payment was late on the first Tahoe (that we traded back in to them BEFORE the first payment was due) and that he didn't want it to damage our credit. We needed to pay it and he would pay the rest of the Tahoe off. Once again, we had to threaten to get a lawyer. We had to contact the credit union to explain what was happening and that we didn't want our credit ruined. It has been a long, drawn out mess! Instead of doing the right thing to begin with, we had to continuously fight with these people to get anything done.  Now they have this very same Tahoe listed on their website.I am warning you...if you do not want a headache, I would look elsewhere. I have since peeled their name off of my vehicle and want no part of anything to do with these people anymore!!!

resp.text: Ms Waite, I am so sorry that we could not offer you a satisfying experience.  Once I found out you were unhappy, I did all that I could do to make it right for you; took the original SUV back, gave you a free loaner car, and purchased a new Tahoe for you.  We post a free Carfax on our website on every vehicle offered for sale, for our customers convenience.  We even discounted the price of the new Tahoe to keep your payments the same, after your credit score dropped almost 80 points, which equaled a loss of $2,800 to us.   Once again, I am sorry that we were not able to exceed your expectations....

name: H. Troge
text: Great place to buy a vehicle,  Adam was very knowledgeable about the vehicle that we inquired about. We did purchase an auto from them due to the respectful  and polite manner that Adam had.

resp.text: Thank you for your business, and the confidence you had in Adam, I will pass it on to him....

name: Mark
text: Can't say anything bad about this place. The guy didn't try pressuring us about anything. After the test drive we noticed cracked window, balding tires and dent when someone crushed the back bumper. The guy worked on us with the price right away. We went in for paperwork and was in and out in less than 15 minutes.  Great customer service guys!

name: Begrudging Google User
text: I usually don't write reviews but I decided that with my experience with this place that it would only be fair to give these guys their due credit. I have bought a couple of vehicles from Sports Center Imports over the last few years and I have nothing but good things to say. I tend to do my research for months prior to purchasing and have a really solid idea of pricing and what to look for in a used vehicle purchase. I watch inventory like a hawk at several dealers in a few areas to get an idea of what is available even before I ever go into buy a vehicle in case I have to play a bit of hardball. Well, I have never had to play hardball with these guys, they have never given me even the slightest issue getting vehicle I am looking for at the price range I have in mind. It's never taken me more than an hour or two to get everything taken care of and out the door. They are one of the two (the other closed down due to the owner retiring) used car dealerships that I would be okay with quite literally walking around with a blindfold on, pointing in a random direction, and buying whichever vehicle I pointed at and knowing I wouldn't have an issue.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the Kudo ! Our entire business model has been built on giving customers a positive vehicle buying experience, and EXCEEDING expectation each and every time....Thanks for your business....

name: Emily Berridge
text: Had the best experience buying a car from Ben and Gaile! Highly recommend

name: Vera Landon
text: We bought a used truck and it cost $4600.00 in repairs.  I feel like we were taken advantage of.

resp.text: Vera, I am so sorry to hear, through google,  that you had issues with your truck, I wish you would have called and let us know, we may could have help steer you in the right direction.  Franchise dealership service departments do want to "FIX" anything, only "REPLACE" Everything.  I had that truck inspected at the time it was traded in, and I personally drove it to KY and back and had no issues what so ever.  I wish I had a crystal ball so I could see what the future is in regards to the vehicles we sell, but I do not.  All we can do is try and make them as front line ready to go as possible,  while maintaining the fact that it is a used a vehicle. Once again Vera, I am sorry that you had issues with your truck, and I do wish that you would have notified us sooner.

text: I bought a 2014 Ford Explorer it was a good price but I found out why real fast it has the seats that flip & @ first look it was so "clean" we didn't even think to look under the 3rd row seats & when i did HANDFULLS OF THICK DOG HAIR & the 3rd row seat belt was chewed up went back 3 or 4 times they Promised it would be spick & span I have picture proof it looked almost the same when I got it back.... I spent all day cleaning & I still find hair sometimes 😭.... & its definitely not from me (they tried to imply it wasn't like this when I bought it i only had it 2 or 3 days when i took it back) if someone wants a dog in there vehicle ok but me personally a dog doesn't get in my vehicle. And not even an offer to trade for something else or let us turn it in & go somewhere else. I had friends interested in 1 of there vehicles & I told them I wouldn't recommend that lot to an enemy.

name: Alec Hadley
text:
On September 10, 2020, my car broke down right outside Chatom AL. I sent my car that was under warranty to Chatom Ford. That was one of my worst mistakes possible. The first week of their service was promising. After that it was all down hill. Shade the “Service Manager” was my main point of contact. He would promise me updates and call backs which I would never get a returning call. On October 16th I was PROMISED my car was repaired and ready for pick up. As I had two friends take off work to take me 5.5 hours to Chatom Ford, Shade called me and said “the car jumped time and is not ready”. The following day I called to get the new date  I could expect my car to be repaired.  Shade then tells me that he had been lying to me and my car was not ready and he does not know why my car is not fixed nor when it could be fixed. During this call he also promised me that the car would be sent to my house in Tennessee. After Shade continued to lie about my car and repairing it, I then moved to speaking with Collin Ward (General Manager)-  I only spoke with him once because he told me “ I’m sure what you are saying MAY have happened, but im sure my team has a better way of going about this story”. He also promised I would get a call back from him and I never did. Collin also asked me why I would even send my car here with it being out of state and not send it local (I was on my way back from vacation on the coast when it happened). In my opinion, this should not matter. With no hope, I called asking for the owner, Gene Brown. No one would help me reach him. Then I finally received a call from Kevin O’Brien. He was very promising and reassuring at first as they all were. Kevin worked with my father and I for about two weeks then he stated to not take our calls or call us back as promised. Last, my father began to work with Lara. She was helpful in helping us know what was going on. She is who we worked with for the rest of this mayhem. 99 days later on December 18th Chatom Ford met me in Mississippi to give me my car. This dealership is an ACTUAL JOKE. From day one I asked for nothing but updates and I never once got that. NOT ONE WORKER AT THIS PLACE (I say place because I can not call this a business because this place has no business structure at all.) was truthful in customer service to my father or myself. If anyone at this place has any further questions feel free to contact me as you have my name and number. PLEASE SAVE YOUR MONEY AND TIME BY NOT SENDING YOUR CAR HERE. THIS MANAGEMENT IS A JOKE AND ABSOLUTELY WORTHLESS IN THEIR PROFESSION.
Thank you for the worst Ford experience I could ever ask for. You really make a name for yourself.

name: John Lohin
text: Sharon called me and told me she has a 2020 dry van trailer available. I specifically wanted a 2020 year. She told me she needed a deposit to keep the trailer for me. I sent it to her. She sent me papers to sign for a 2019 trailer, I asked her about it and she kept saying it’s the accounting mistake. They changed the papers to show the year 2020. Before my loan closing, I called her and asked her what’s the company’s name exactly so my bank could make the cashiers check. After I finalized my loan she sent me a bill of sale for a 2019 trailer. I called her and she says it is definitely a 2019. The accounting keeps making a mistake. How did they change my papers to show 2020 from the first place? She told me she could give me $400 off. I said no thanks. I’m not going to pay the same money for a 2019, when a 2019 is a few thousand cheaper than a 2020. Sharon wasn’t honest from the beginning.

name: JR Cambron
text:
I have dealt with Langford Quality Cars for about 23 years now. I have fond them to be very understanding when I was sick and had to have surgery, I let them know I could not afford to keep the truck I had they came and picked it up then when I got out of the hospital and was able to return to work they sold me another truck with no down payment.
Janet has always been understanding if people would call and let her know they were getting behind because of losing a job or some kind of illness. I have always known her to work with people if they gave here the respect of letting her know what was happening.
The people I hear talking bad about them are the ones who don't call and move. Or hide their cars then they get mad and badmouth her and the business.I have also noticed most of those people have a history of trying to keep from paying for what they buy from anyone and according to them it is always the business or the people that work there that cause the problem. But really it is just the customers going from place to place trying to beat businesses out of their merchandise without paying for it.

THANK YOU LANGFORD I HAVE ENJOYED OUR LONG ASSOCIATION. AND LOOK FORWARD TO MANY MORE YEARS.

text: Looking for my car

name: ashley Moran
text: These guys are awesome! They have great attitudes and are very easy to work with. I bought a car from them recently and they worked with me in every way possible. I highly recommend Austin & Tommy (the owners). I wouldn't go anywhere else to buy a vehicle, they truly care about their customers. LOVE them!!!!

name: Jodie McKinley
text: As much as I would like to leave more stars for the quick and efficient buying of a truck from Kip, I have to say that TNT sold us a lemon. The truck we bought in November has something wrong with it every week which means my husband is throwing money at parts instead of trying to make the payment. They sold us an expensive extended warranty that we knew nothing about and when the air conditioner went out in the truck, we were told the warranty covers powertrain ONLY. Save time and money and shop elsewhere, There are plenty more reputable dealers around that won't sell you a piece of junk.

name: Clint Chance
text: They welcomed us in with open arms, were more than accommodating. Staff was friendly, however pre-occupied. We bought our vehicle in September. The owner was willing to pay for faulty sensors on the vehicle found at time of purchase. The only major complaint that I have is to Make sure that they complete ALL the paperwork before you leave to help you avoid frequent subsequent trips to sign your name.

name: Kylee Hovel
text: Absolutely the best in the business!!! We got an excellent deal on our Acadia.  It's fully loaded, excellent condition and we couldn't be happier.  Highly recommended!!

name: Michael Goins
text: I went to 2 of Mobile's highest rated car detailers with my car due to me having sap dried on my paint.  WIth no luck at either of these places I contacted TNT and took the car in and in no time my car was back to looking brand new again!!  I refer this place to anyone now who is looking for someone to detail their vehicle..  Staff could not have been nicer and accommodating!!

name: Daniel Woods
text: The worse car lot ever they payments is very expensive they cars are not worth it. They screwed me an my family over on a truck that we had purchased they signed an agreement saying that they was gone fix it in they didnt. Than they told me not to worry about the payments an to use the money to fix it cause they couldn't find the problem. So I found the problem but it was to expensive for me so I told them yesterday that I would catch the payments up today an let them fix it. Than they came got it saying I didnt make payments an told me I was a liar on Facebook. They are very bad people.

name: Carlos Garcia
text:
One of the best lots ive ever been to.
Got a good deal on a nice truck. Payments are reasonable. The staff is awsome. Thank you david and kip for being down to earth and honest. Will definitley be buying my next truck from here.

name: john milligan
text: great group of guys:) made my car buying easy !!! nice selection of vehicles and the warentys are a plus!!! was in and out in no time with a realy nice car!! would deffenty deal with again in the future and i highly recomend these guys for your car buying needs.

name: David Warren
text: There is a muscular guy with a light beard. Dude, you don't belong there. Crawl back into your mommy's basement. Stay there, don't ever come out. This world is better off without you.

name: David Allain
text:
Started my journey with renting a UHAUL truck and trailer two weeks before the move. Megan was very knowledgeable and helped me make the right truck size choice. Unfortunately, the uhaul reservation system was down that day so I reserved from home later that week.

For some reason the “traffic” division of UHAUL that is not based in Auburn changed my reservation the day before and I was going to have to go to Phoenix City to pick up a truck, and Opelika to pick up the trailer. Ended up working with Hunter King and Hugh three times in one day, the day before the rental pickup date, to iron out my issues.

Hunter gave the info for traffic try and get it sorted out, which eventually did work. There wasn’t anything he could do to add my reservation to the store because they were out of truck. By an act of God someone canceled later and I got the truck I needed at this location. Then “traffic” moved it again..

Needless to say. Hunter K. was knowledgeable, patient, and extremely helpful in getting the reservation squared away again and even helped add an extra day to my reservation so I could get the truck immediately.

11/10 recommend this store because of the employees Megan, Hunter K., and Hugh.

I say everything here to show you how much of a hassle it can be to reserve online. If you can reserve in-person at this store it will save SOOO many headaches.

War Damn Eagle

name: Tuyen_2000
text: Paperwork got messed up and I got charged for 460 miles instead of the 30 I did. Seem to think it's perfectly fine to do 460 miles in six hours and refuse to refund the couple hundred dollars they overcharged. Just rent a truck, don't come here.

name: joy G
text:
Best service Ever. Megan is the best
She is so friendly and helpful
I would like to give more than 5 stars
Box Truck rental was efficient and well run.
Fast and efficient. Customer service courteous and professional.
Highly recommended

name: Amber K
text: They are the absolute worst! I've never met a set of ruder people in my life. If you can't go to another uhaul location just pick Budget or Penske and save yourself the headache.

name: Jerry F
text: Megan is the best.  Never expected such friendly and incredible service when I needed help moving my son in to college.  Thank you so much for your help Megan.  You made my day and my week easier.  Highly recommend.

name: Nick Britton
text: Super friendly and helpful staff. I had to go into the store multiple times and interacted with several different people. They were all courteous.

name: Mohammadnaser Ansari
text: I had some issues with the truck and the roadside assistance was completely useless. They did not have any service available in Auburn at the time (near downtown). However, the lady in charge of the store was exceptionally helpful (didn't get the name). The only reason I will rent again is only for the great customer service in the store.

name: Pierce M
text: Hunter is a great employee. Super helpful and a good communicator which made renting / returning a breeze.

name: N Stovah
text: Hunter was excellent. Very friendly and knowledgeable. Deserves a big raise.

name: Leonard Sloan
text: Quick fast and easy service

name: Laurie Hillanbrand
text: A No Show. We made a reservation for a Move In date for a Saturday. The woman who took the information said they are no longer open on a Saturday, but she would make the exception for this time. She gave us her personal cell phone number and asked if we would call 15 minutes before arrival and she would meet us to sign the paper work. We did just that, no one picked up, but we left a message. We arrived with a dorm room full of stuff to store for the summer and we called again, no answer. The sign on the door of the office said they were closed but to call the number (her number)AND the national number, which is what we did. The Representative for the national number said the U-HAUL company doesn't allow their storage buildings to close on a Saturday and that they couldn't do more to help us. So while we waited for a return phone call, we started looking at other storage places near by and STOR-EAGLE Storage was able to accommodate us with no problems! At the time of this review it has been almost 5 hours since we left a message at U-HAUL Moving & Storage of Auburn and we still did not get a return phone call. Make a reservation at your own risk.

name: Rachel Sugg
text:
My husband and I chose to use Uhaul for our move because it was the best affordable option. For future moves we will do everything we can to avoid working with them again.

After making a reservation a month in advance, we found that our truck had been double booked and watched it be given to someone else right in front of us. When asked for some kind of alternative or assistance, the man who was supposed to be helping us simply told us, “That’s too bad,” and that we could call the national Uhaul line. Because our state is becoming overwhelmed with COVID-19 cases, we used the Uhaul app to check in and pick up the truck. However, the man helping us said that we should have come inside (where not a single employee was masked) if we wanted the truck. We understand that this situation may not have been this individual’s fault, but his behavior made our situation even more distressing, as he was quite rude, even belligerent, and made no attempt at an apology for this very disruptive mistake.

This mixup has made our lives very difficult, and we were sorely disappointed in the employee’s attitude toward us. In the future, we will not be using Uhaul, and from now on we will be warning others about this.

name: Chelsea Clayton
text: I have rented uhaul trailers before but I have never had an experience like this one! The employees absolutely knocked my socks off!! Brandon, Megan, and Blake have absolutely made this experience the best I have ever had.  I will definitely come back to this location for all my rental needs!!

name: Space Cadet
text: Great service and very friendly. Have dropped off Uhauls twice here in the past month.

name: Corey Harris
text:
We waited in the store for 10 mins until
Someone walked in from the back to help. We did the scan and go on the app, and the man still wanted to verify our items and print a confirmation. Why do scan and go if you have to wait in line anyways?

name: Gopal Nath
text: I reserved 15’ truck.  Before  picking up they assigned me 26’  truck instead,  saying that 15’ not available.

name: Zongru Han
text: Worst service ever, staff is rude and they wouldn’t talk to you for more than 10min

name: Jose Torres
text: Uhaul's online booking system made some major errors on my booking, but I had a ton of time-saving help from the staff at this location. They helped me get the correct size truck for my move.

name: Cal Warriner
text: Could not have been better. Guy behind counter was quick and efficient. Guy who hooked trailer up just as good. In and out in 20 minutes including purchase of wardrobes, tape, boxes and part for hitch.

name: William Paris
text: Megan was very helpful and the store had everything I needed. Thank you. I wasn't expecting such a pleasant experience.

name: James S
text: Unable to complete reservation because "keys were lost by last person to use the van." First, there should be duplicates. Second, I was called the morning I was supposed to move. Why even bother guaranteeing something that is not there? After cancelling my reservation and having me go around town looking for a same-day, 3x more rental, the location did not even tell me about the U-Haul program that gives partial reimbursements for failed guarantees.

name: Paramjit “Perry” Kahai, PhD
text:
The rep who assisted me at this store is a tall, bearded man.  As soon as he handed me the truck, I took a picture of the odometer. On the contract, he had mileage out that was lower than what I saw before I started moving. The mileage out should be the odometer mileage when the truck is handed to the customer, not the mileage that may be on their records when the truck was returned by a previous customer.

Also, unknown to me, there was a dolly in the back that I had not even reserved.  I saw it only when I opened the back to load my stuff.  I was surprised, to say the least and wondered if I will be billed for it. Guess what?  I was billed for it even though I had not used it. And how did he know that I had used it? When I called this morning, he told me that the plastic tab that was attached to the dolly was broken. When I try to assure him that I had not even touched the dolly, his response was rude and something like "we have a lot of customers who say they didn't use the dolly but they actually did." In short, he had just accused me of lying!  My question is: why was the dolly even there in the first place? I had not reserved it!  And if there was something in the back of the truck, he should have opened the back and shown it to me.  I would have asked for the dolly to be taken out. Further, how do I know that tab wasn't broken before the truck keys were handed to me? So, this was a clear case of an attempt to cheat a customer.  I wonder how many people this store rep has cheated.  Next time, if I ever rent again from this location (which I very much doubt) or any other, I will make certain to open the back and have them remove any extra stuff I did not order!

Any attempts at talking with the rep over the phone was met with rude, curt, and insulting responses.  The phone call was recorded by the location, so that will provide evidence of whether I am telling the truth about the rep's attitude and lack of respect towards me.

BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU RENT A TRUCK AT THIS LOCATION. INSPECT EVERYTHING BEFORE YOU LEAVE AND HAVE THEM REMOVE EVERYTHING YOU HAD NOT RESERVED.

name: Shari Belton
text: The General Manager greets you at the door. I had a reservation to pick up a trailer for my son and later found out it wasn't needed. The store was able to refund my money within two days, even though I purchased a one-way rental. Be sure to stop by there for all of your rental needs!

name: John Parker
text: Without a doubt, the most unprofessional outfit of workers I've ever witnessed behind a single desk. My sister went into the store to complete the very routine process of accessing her storage unit. However, unbeknownst to her or anyone else, they were full and instead rerouted her reservation to Georgia. This information was not even gathered until they second attempt to receive help from the desk, for the first time we spoke to their general manager, Tavon Scott, who was at the moment in no mood to do his job. As soon as he saw that our last name did not come up in the computer, he looked at us as if we were crazy and then proceeded to profusely rid himself of all blame ("it was the call center") and yelled at us for becoming frustrated at the fact that we seemingly had no storage. He was completely unwilling to make up for the fault of his company in any capacity and did nothing but sit there and act annoyed at our frustration. I dropped by one last time to use the restroom and I could hear them quoting us and laughing at our situation until they saw I had come in. I was so disgusted at their attitude about their job that I marched up to the desk to get Mr. Scott's full name to write in this report, to which he replied, laughing "You can just look up my name if you need it." I replied "take care" and he replied "oh I will take care" and continued to murmur something under his breath to the amusement of his coworkers. I've never held an official job to this date, but if I talked half as rudely to any customer as they did to us, I'd expect to be canned on the spot, and that's exactly what I wish upon this man, Mr. Scott. I'd equate this crew to a group of shiftless, gawky teenagers who are too immature to own up to their own shortcomings. Simply put, these insolent fools don't know how to represent a company and don't appreciate the name stitched onto their shirt. They've made a decision to be bad at what they do. One star for knowing English.

name: Mark Gallagher
text: My reserved trailer was rented to another person which sent it over 90 miles away.   However, since we all remained calm; they worked with us and gave us a 17 foot truck which worked out so much better than a small trailer.  It had better gas milage, great air conditioning, and we didn't need to pay extra for a logistical error.  Thanks guys at Auburn U-Haul for making my move stress free and helping out even though you really didn't need to....

name: Christopher Abreu
text: I had reserved a truck a month in advance, only to have it redirected from this location to another 45 minutes away the day before my move. They claim they were “overbooked”, even though they confirmed the reservation to me over the phone earlier in the week, and was not updated online until after the email. Calling the office takes you to their call center, where you either get someone that is willing to help or someone that hangs up on you. I would not recommend bringing your business here, as the overall experience was unprofessional, sloppy, and infuriating.

name: Whitney Mullins
text: I reserved a self-storage climate control unit with U-Haul on February 1st. I kept the email confirmation and went by to make sure everything was in order so my roommate could begin moving their stuff into storage. After twenty minutes of waiting in line I showed them the email and asked how to go about getting access to the unit since I had never done this before. The man looked up everything and said I was nowhere in the system. I showed him the confirmation and everything that was needed and he said he was sorry, but there was nothing he could do. The manager came out and said that they have not had the climate control storage for over two months now. I told him I have had the unit reserved since February and received no notice that anything was changed. I even called two days ago checking to make sure and the lady said everything was fine. I asked them if they could help me out because I had to find somewhere to put the items because I have to be moved out by noon tomorrow and cannot move into my new place until August 15. They said they could not help me and turned me away. I will never use the company of U-Haul again. There was only one storage unit available in the city of Auburn, and it was at Uncle Bob's storage. The only reason they had it available was because someone cancelled an hour before I called. Thank goodness for that.

name: Randy Mauldin
text:
I rented a 26' truck today. You double billed my credit card. I should have known that you were a disreputable business when Michael asked me for my credit card without quoting me a price. Since you are a monopoly I guess you think that people will pay any amount of money to rent a truck.
He then quoted me a price which I agreed to. I found out when I picked up the truck that he conveniently failed to tell me that there is a hidden fee of $0.99 a mile. WOW, now you have added $80 in hidden fees.
I started to cancel the reservation but then I remembered that you are the only place that rents moving equipment. I had to move so I was stuck with the extortion.
Since you are greedy bastards, you decide to go ahead and stick it to me. You double billed my credit card to make up for the frustration of dealing with an unhappy customer.
Rest assured that this isn't the end of the case. I will contact my credit card company and I will make sure that all of the milage charge is reversed as well as the double billing. When you quote a price, you must honor it.

name: Casten FIscher
text: I use this place frequently to get trailers for hauling things.  They usually have the trailers I need, and they are usually quick to get me in and out.  I have been to other uhaul centers who are not helpful at all, so it is refreshing to go here.

name: Gullatte Acres
text: I dropped off a trailer and had excellent service.

name: Elliott Wood
text: Staff doesn't know squat about their products. The lady on the phone said i would need to buy transmission fluid for my trailer hitch. Recommend a different dealer.

name: nicole gathe
text: Brad was great! He got us in and out when we picked up and returned. No issues with prices or quotes. A+

name: Jared Hawsey
text: Rented a trailer and they were very nice and quick. In and out in a flash

name: Jerrell Knight
text: Worst customer experience I EVER had. Customer service rep did not want to do his job and tried to stale so he wouldn't have to do his job.

name: Andypatt43
text: Went into store to get wiring for my trailer hitch.  After about 30 mins and no employees in the store to help the 5-7 people that had accumulated behind me in line.  When the guy came back out to help me he said I must talk to installation tech.  When the tech came out bout 10 mins later he proceeds to tell me that I can't make a reservation in the store I had to do it on-line.(just to get me out if store I think).     After calling customer care they told me this was absurd u must make appointment in store.  So long story short their a bunch of lazy people that wanna do nothing.  They also told me that it would take an hour, but the service rep on phone said 4 hours and would be $210.00 plus parts and wire.   Called CTU(CUSTOM TRUCKS UNLIMITED) RIGHT up the street and they install for $125.00 parts and all.  Never ever using these morons again. And the tech should be reprimanded for lying to customer to get out of work!  Never going back.  Customer service goes along way and they have None!

name: Curtis Keller
text: Nice team.  Very customer centered

name: Garrett Vickery
text: Van rental was easy and pretty quick. Returned it afterhours and didnt have to go through any sort of checkin process.

name: Felecia Brock
text: They have alot to offer when moving.

name: Gerry Hicks
text: Made a reservation for a uhaul truck and they did not honor it. Then after I called them out for there wrong doing they took no blame. At least if you are going to not honor a reservation own up to it.

name: Ethan Parker
text: They said I had a truck (I reserved 3 weeks in advance), then they changed the size I was set to pick up, upped the rate, then said they didn't have a truck. Do not waste your time.

name: jerrilynn freeman
text: If you want to move in town or out of town or even out of state they have a plan for you. Ask about there one way drop off

name: Seyun Oh
text: The hitch was carelessly done and the wire was torn. It has been only a week and I didn't even get to use it once. Very disappointing and time consuming that it need to get fixed.

name: Emily Hamilton
text: Went to return a vehicle and waited over 45 minutes for anyone to even come to the counter to help me.

name: Brenda McCarthy
text: Recommend to EVERYONE

name: Amelia Trenga
text: Came in day of and they accommodated us well

name: Debra Abu-Dames
text: Friendly staff...above and beyond.

name: Kathryn McCoy
text: Not enough staff on high volume days.

name: kromel03
text: Employees argued with us that a 2013 f150 (with an 8000lb uhaul installed tow package) weighed less than 3000 lbs.

name: josh crawford
text: I visited 4 different lots then ended up coming back to the very first one (stallions) for my car. They have some of the cheapest prices in Birmingham and the car buying process was super easy. Samir was very friendly and let me test drive until I found the car I wanted. Mrs.Audra was eager to help inside and paperwork was done in no time. Would definitely recommend

name: Kelly Ballam
text: Rakan was very friendly and very helpful. The process of buying my car went very smooth and was a pleasant experience all around.

name: kr
text:
I needed a reliable car for a decent price. I looked online and found stallions auto and knew immediately where I needed to go.

I test drove any car I wanted and was able to come to a decision in under an hour. a good selection of cars, all constantly being detailed. I left the lot with a car newer than I expected and well under budget. I highly recommend this business!

name: Larry Smitherman
text: Just like any other father, I was very scared and hesitant in shopping for a car for my upcoming 16 year old, I mean who wouldn’t? I want to make sure I put my kid in a safe and reliable vehicle. Upon arriving to the dealership (which is not a fancy dealership by any means) I saw the vehicle that we had seen on this dealerships partner advertising site. Moments later I walked up to the office and met the person that I had originally spoke with on the phone, Lee. He made me feel at home and welcomed me in a polite manner. No pushy sales person mentality here. Very straight forward and comfortable atmosphere. I test drove the vehicle, liked it. It’s a used car and I don’t expect perfect for $6K. Needless to say, the 2012 Rogue with 120k was the perfect buy. AWESOME! Will be back and will recommend you to friends and relatives in the area, cheers.

name: Amos Sunday
text: They are scammers. I bought a car for over $10,000.00. Check engine light came on before I made it home. I called them 3 times to discuss options. Each time they said they would call me back. (Never did) . I suggest only buying cars from here if you have had them fully checked out by a mechanic or if they still have a warranty.

name: Nick R
text: The best used car buying experience my family and I have ever had. I was a student looking for an inexpensive user car and they had tons of options. Found the perfect car and got a fair price and drove it home that day. These guys are great and were honest with me from start to finish. I’ve had this car for about a week now and no problems it’s been a great ride. 5/5 stars, Stallion Autos is the way to go!

name: kat osborne
text: It’s really hard to find great quality, prices and customer service in today’s world of car shopping! I hit pay dirt with these guys!!! The office manager, putting it mildly because she can do any job there, Audra was down home pleasant and eager to help! Lee was helpful and courteous!! Our family is planning another purchase and we will give Stallions our business!!!

name: Calvin Jenkins
text: Very easy. Friendly. Well mannered staff. Professional. They knew they’re inventory by heart. A wide variety of vehicles. I was very impressed and pleased with my purchase. Highly recommend.

name: adam ledbetter
text: Very nice group of people here! Reasonable prices and they still worked with me on an out the door price. Paid cash and completed the transaction in under 20 minutes. Highly recommend going here if you are looking for a good used car. Very large selection.

name: dward eagle
text: This place was great. We drove an hour to test drive a car and turned out to be a good first car for my daughter. Everyone was nice and not pushy like the normal used car places. Process of purchase was quick and easy. We will def be coming back when looking for a vehicle!!

name: Lori Mckoy
text: I bought a 2010 Toyota Prius for my teenage daughter there. When I asked, the salesman if the car was in good condition, he said the car was in great condition. Since buying it not quite 2 months ago I’ve had to spend almost $1,000 after buying it for 5,000.  I would not recommend Stallions to anyone. I called after the first repair asking if I could just return it for a refund and was told no. So that shows they don’t stand behind the quality of the cars they sell.

resp.text: - [ ] Hey Ms.  Lori. My friend just  bought a brand new Maserati. Only been a few months and he’s having to do some repairs. Few thousand dollar repairs. I’m not sure what the problem was with your car but we could have helped you by sending you somewhere to get a better price. But every car will eventually need something fixed.  Parts get worn out and go bad. It’s normal.

name: Lamar King
text: Did not purchase a car but I thought I should review the great customer service .Ronza was very polite , understanding, and committed to her work .she was great at explaining everything to us. Great customer service is hard to find, but you can find it here.I highly recommend anyone to her and Stallions Auto for your next car purchases.

name: Chris Banks
text: Great people great cars you want find anywhere else.. quick service I was in and out in a flash... I will go back and recommend them to new buyers

name: Jessica Hennington
text: This was the calmest shopping experience I’ve ever had. I was happy to purchase my Kia from here as a new mom my number one goal was a safe and reliable vehicle. Lee and Alex knew my needs and went above and beyond to make sure they were all met. Mrs. Audra in the office was extremely polite and patient with all of my questions during the paperwork process. I would definitely recommend buying a car from here!

name: Ran Cedriq Washington Sr.
text: My son, Ronald Washington bought a car from this company in November of 2020 and it had NO PROBLEMS safe out runs GREAT. My wife and I are ooking forward to going and purchasing a BMW sometime soon. A great company to purchase from! We'll do more business with Stallions!

name: Cyndi Bonner
text: Do not finance your car through this company.   They will repo your car if one payment is late and cost you thousands of dollars to get your car back.   You have been warned!

name: Kimberly C Nunn-Washington
text: My son, Ronald Washington bought a car from this company in November of 2020 and it had NO PROBLEMS safe out runs GREAT. My husband and I are ooking forward to going and purchasing a BMW sometime soon. A great company to purchase from! We'll do more business with Stallions!

name: Jessica Alnemer
text: the workers inside the office are very polite and they help you get answers to all of your questions. very easy to communicate with. affordable prices. rakan and laith are very professional, helpful people. would recommend.

name: Muhammed
text: Stallions was awesome. The customer service was impeccable. They helped me find the perfect fit for me and my wife. We both financed our vehicles from stallions, and have shopped with them over the past ten years with amazing service. I currently drive a Toyota solara, while my wife drives a Toyota Camry- both of which exceeded our expectations. Would recommend to shop all your auto vehicles from this spot

name: Alex Paquette
text: My experience with stallions was great. Jessica helped me with every step of the buying process from finding the vehicle to getting my paperwork done. It was the easiest car buying experience I've had

name: Darkness X
text: Ronald Washington whom is my brother came home with this fresh new car from this company last year in November. It's so clean and he won't let us eat in it!

name: Kenitra Young
text: Mr.Lee has been a great salesman ., I’ve purchased a Sequoia Toyota 2005 and he has good running cars . I truly would recommend any other person to him . I Thank him so much for his service .

name: MADD Boom
text: Great people really helpful n they care .

name: William Beaty
text: These guys are awesome! Family owned and operated. 19 years here. They know the area. They gave us an amazing price, and negotiated fairly with us. They are all about building relationships, and establishing their reputation as an honest business contributing to our community.

name: Tez Finley
text: Variety. Quality. Affordable. Good business. Recommend

name: Pete Zane
text: Spectacular experience every time since 2014. Thanks. Keep up the good work. I always send people looking for a vehicle your way because y’all always done me right

name: Johnathan Washington
text: Man.. My brother Ron WASHINGTON bought a Passat and it looked better than mine! I bought mines before he bought his! My got scratches on it cause I bought it out of BIRMINGHAM but I should've waited for him before I got mine. How was also CHEAPER THAN MINE! UMM GON'T but my next car from Stallions cause I see EVERYBODY IN my town, riding wit a Stallions tag on they cars.

name: Maya Nelson
text: This place was awesome! Lee was very helpful and informative of whatever questions I had even when I felt like I was asking too many. Would definitely recommend y’all!

name: James Holeman
text: Happy to leave a 5 star for this place. Visited 3 lots and ended up back where I started. Price won me over. Thanks Lee

name: Bethany Beaty
text: We had a great experience at Stallions Auto! We found the listing online, test drove it, and took it to a mechanic for pre-purchase inspection. The price was so great that no negotiation was even needed! Once we decided to buy, we had papers signed in 10 minutes. Great hassle free experience!

name: jeremy lane
text: This was my second stop. I spoke with Lee and he was super upfront about the vehicle I was inquiring about. Gave me the run down on what it needed and what was almost due as far as maintenance. I enjoyed the straight forwardness and which I had put a deposit down to hold the vehicle. I chose to go look at one more car lot and take my chance, by time I chose to do business with Lee the vehicle I initially wanted was sold. I explored more options and ended up in a 2013 Toyota Camry Le. Paid cash, was provided a Carfax and went on my way. Easy short and sweet.

name: Hun Lui
text: I found exactly what I was looking for at Stallions Auto. A good dependable reasonably priced automobile for my daughter. They had such an incredible selection of vehicles at the price range I was looking for. When in search for a used car I don’t expect a PERFECT used car, I am reasonable and I think they were more than reasonable with me. Answered all my questions, showed me the Carfax and had me on my way in about 25 minutes. Will definitely be a repeat customer thanks to the excellent customer service and pricing.

name: Tonya Henson
text: New to area and luckily found these guys! Took the nerves away and prices I can afford!! Very customer service oriented and Audra was super helpful!! Rick and Lee so sweet

name: Marcus Brown
text:
I am going to give these folks a high five ! What a pleasant experience. Very friendly, effeciant, and honest. I felt very comfortable in my decision. I know it is an unfamiliar time with what is going on around us. We planned ahead. I applied for credit and spoke with Lee. It was so simple and what a great deal !. Everyone was wearing a mask and being observant of caution. I was literally only there for an hour ! My purchase / completion of paperwork maybe took 30 minutes ! What an awesome experience and a great car !
Mini Countryman S...I am in love

name: Gerica Cammack
text: This is the 1st place I've came across that do layaway. This is a good way to earn someone's business.

name: Robert Joe
text: Lee was great. Not a fancy dealership but cars are priced very fairly and great selection of vehicles for cheap. Drove of the lot in my brand new Altima in no time!

name: rolando antonio
text: my sister told me about this place after she bought her car, she said they have good deals. i saw good reviews online so i got a car for my son. car is running good no issues. good business. good prices

name: crane industries LLC
text: Bought a company sales delivery automobile from Lee and I was very content with the value and price. Paid cash money and was presented true straight forward information in regards to condition and history. Came with good tires and body looked fair for the price. Happy man overall. I will recommend you

name: Jackie Olson
text: I went to stallions because they had great deals and My credit is not great and no where would finance me. They also have good quality cars my mom told me about them after I ran all around town. Thank you Rick and everyone at stallion see y’all in 2 weeks

name: Samuel London
text: This is my second time purchasing. Great  experience and not to forget to mention how awesome their customer service is. Make sure to ask for Rakan or Lee, very helpful!

name: Jarrod Jones
text: Very well. Nicely put together package. They fit well with what we were looking for. Honest, trust worthy, upfront people. Very “unsalesman” like. Pointed me in the direction of which  3 vehicle to narrow my search down. Listed pros and cons on each and was very enlightened on his knowledge of his vehicles. Will definitely buy another in the future (hopefully not anytime soon)

name: Gina Portobello
text: Amazing service. One stop shop. Did my financing on one car through them without checking my credit and bought another one cash. I was also referred to a upholstery store to  take my aunts car that needs seats repaired. All in all I’m beyond satisfied. Thank y’all

name: Ronza Alnemer
text: Everything went smoother than expected. I would recommend them to anyone looking or needing a good dealership..... Lee was very considerate and courteous and extremely helpful  He will help you with everything you need He is very professional...I would recommend any one to him!

name: Alexa Naiomi
text: Just got my Infiniti from Rick at stallions. Y’all go see him. I went to 4 dealers before I went there and no one wanted to sell me a car but he did. Thank you

name: Jill Crenshaw
text: My go to car guys for 6 years now. They got me 3 different cars that I asked them to find. I’m thankful to know some people like them in the car business because I got screwed when I lived in Florida! So I appreciate you

name: Dj Simmerton
text: Made a drive out to see the vehicle my daughter wanted, they were very nice over the phone as well as in person. Drove back and have kept us with my services since then, no problem at all what so ever with the way they handled our procedure! Very hands on and quick, we appreciated the conversation! Good place to conduct a cash sale (We looked) - Thank you Lee

name: John Kennedy
text: Great selection and very helpful staff.

name: Samir Huneidi
text: 10/10. Great selection of vehicles at fair prices with a fantastic staff. Everything was very straightforward and I got my car and the paperwork done In no time. Would highly recommend.

name: Darryl Little
text: Man y’all were all so good to me and my family and just want to take time out our day to say thank you in a few ways. We’ll be bringing all your employees lunch next week. We went to a few other places and no one treated us the way y’all did or did half of the things y’all did. THANK YOU! We love our cars from y’all

name: Tyler Rose
text: Stallions has helped my family out so much man. We can’t say thank you enough. I appreciate y’all. Great customer service

name: Northernhighlandgourmet Gourmetfeast
text: The guy with the short hair and a beard helped me significantly. Not only in my car buying process, but also in recommending me a place to upkeep my Porsche! Good cash deals. Good smooth transaction. Straight to the point. I’m the type of person that likes someone to shoot me straight! Thanks

name: Freddie Percy
text: 5 stars. Ask for Lee. Straight forward dude. I wanted a good price for a dependable vehicle. An overpriced car at a “fancy” dealership was not what I was in search of. Stallions did the job for me. Thanks guy

name: Jose Terrado
text: Came to look at a Prius that I saw on Cars.com, I liked the way it handled. I didn’t end up buying the Prius but I bought a Jetta. Enjoyed working with these folks. (5 weeks ago)

name: Nicholas Cole
text: I was very impressed with their inventory and their customer service. all the cars I inquired about were priced well under book value. Lady that picked up the phone had great customer service skills. My wife is happy. So I’m a Happy customer

name: Debbie McAlister
text: I loved my whole experience. I got a great deal because I was coming with straight cash.  Lady was nice and informative over the phone. Highly recommend this business. Many great reviews. A++

name: Lorie Smitherman
text: Straight forward. I don’t like car shopping for weeks, they make it easy. Not forceful and pushy. Liked the bluntness and I appreciate a straight forward person more than anything. Lee gave me the down payments and review the paper work with me in no time. Was a happy and satisfied customer

name: Anna Lawson
text: I am so freaking happy I finally got the car I wanted and it was in our budget. I’ve been looking for 3 weeks and the Volkswagens all were all priced more than what I had. I found one at Stallions with lower miles and even cheaper. I was in shock. Thank you Rick me and my family loved working with you and your workplace.

name: mike clemens
text: nice selection. under book value. carfax on all

name: Tony Alaraj
text: The cash deals I found at Stallions were unmatchable in the area. Lee answered all my questions, showed me the vehicle history and was straight up with me. I did not need any credit and I was a cash buyer. Very well mannered sales people.

name: cleandria kennedy
text: Literally the best experience! Beautiful family, very professional and trustworthy! Thank you guys, I don’t think I would have found a better deal! If you don’t know where to start, start here, you will not be disappointed!

name: Ricky Bailey
text: I found a few vehicles I liked after I searched other dealers for a long time. Prices were way below the other local dealers. I respect their way of operating. Thank you for your time and business

name: sharlay gibson
text: Talked to them on the phone and set up a time to go in for a test drive, car was in excellent condition, they faxed my bank all the paper work and I drove off in my new Jeep! hassle free. great prices and friendly staff. thanks again

name: justice sanders
text: Wonderful experience. Very friendly staff. Spoke with a young lady over the phone after I looked up their deals on their website and now I’m driving a car I saw on the website. Thank you guys for being so great

name: Melissa Small
text: Pleasant experience would do again

name: Veronica Parker
text: I went to stallion auto sale to look at cars and when I got there I got that BMW  and when I tell you iam please with the salesman who sold me the car if any one looking to purchase a car I highly recommend y’all go to stallion auto y’all won’t b disappointed I’m in love with my BMW 28i turbo everyone is so nice and friendly

name: Hamzah Tarawneh
text: By far the best car lot around town awesome deals and great customer service!

name: jackie aldridge
text: I want to thank the boys at the shop at Stallions for making it easy for me to test drive and buy the Accord. They were sweet, laid back and honest. I knew i was buying a used car and they walked me through the car buying process very quickly and had me in and out the door within 30 minutes. I cant walk far distances or stand on my feet for very long so i appreciated that.

name: Dede Charles
text: Love my car. Love y’all. I can’t stress how happy I am. I didn’t feel pressured. I felt welcomed and appreciated. My cousin told me to come here. He’s happy and our friends are happy dealing with y’all. We’ll be back. Good business

name: Shala
text: I bought a car in honesty and WAS NOT sold a car in honesty. Prior to buying the car he stated there was nothing MAJOR wrong with car. Once I bought the car and realized the key remote was not programmed to the car so it would not lock, it needed a new battery, the dashboard headset was not working. I just came from VW dealership to get the key reprogrammed and they check that the car had a gas leak and the turbo needed fixing. 3500 dollars worth of work. I called Lee at the dealership and he told me I should have gotten it checked. You bought the car! i would NEVER recommend this dealership to my worst enemy. I believe if you are going to sell a car at a higher rate, then you need to make sure the car is worth selling it at that rate. If I could give them  zero stars I would. he just a salesman trying to sell you a far, he doesn't care what happens to you afterwards.

name: Dee Smith
text: If your exhausted, from high pressure  car dealerships sales department,s then I highly recommend  This place ,  the staff was a refreshing experience and extremely helpful,  and awesome  vehicle, s , I will recommend them from now on ,sincerely  Dee . s👍

name: Marsha
text: This place is awesome! They truly care about their customers! I would recommend them to anyone looking to get a good car for a good price.

name: Victorian
text:
Updated post: They say the third time is a charm and it is!!!!!! Went back to Stallions today and I love my new car!!!!! Same great prices and there's a new Sheriff in town lol. Yep new management, Lee is the best!!!!!
Old post: I Went to  Stallions 3 months ago and really enjoyed myself! Bethany was great!!!!! She and I talked the whole time, just girl talk and family talk. I laughed the whole time I was in the office. Our salesman was Lee and he was great also!!!! Don't believe the bad reviews because I almost did, and was hesitant about going. Glad I went!!!! All you need is a down payment,  drivers license, social security card, and you'll have the car of your dreams. I hope this helps someone.

name: mahmoud A
text: I was very pleased with my visit this past weekend. We originally came in looking at a Jetta until my wife steered me into looking at a Mercedes CLS500 that caught her eye. We test drove it, walked in the office, 15 minutes of paperwork and we were on the road. I will not overlook this lot. Will be back!

name: Michael Winston
text: Very unprofessional!!  I was told several lies throughout the buying process. Their system for accepting payments are stone-age and they lied about the condition of the car (service lights, broken mirror, and scratches). Buy at your own risk!

name: Linda bowden
text: I work next door to Stallions and It was time for a new vehicle so I decided to stop by. My husband came with me and we were very pleased with our experience thus far. Nice array of cars! Thanks guys. Changed my oil and that's it!

name: Bailey Chapman
text: Me and my sister just drove off in our new cars. I Was in and out. Very Happy customers. great service and great cars

name: Jessie Langston
text: Got in touch with Stallions over the phone and set up a appointment to view a vehicle. Came in test drove it and paid with money orders. Very easy and smooth transaction. Not pushy. Answered every question me and my brother had. Thank you Rick.

name: Ali Fulladi
text:
Bought my car from here, and my brother got his from here as well.

I had a great experience and I have nothing but good things to say about these guys, I got an Audi and it runs like a beast. Super friendly staff and they walk you through the whole process and make it easy for you. I've had a terrible experience in the past with car dealers but these guys broke the stereotype. Laith was my rep and i'm so impressed. Thank you guys for your help.

name: Jerry Pridemore
text: I had a good phone conversation prior to arriving, asked about tires since I had a 2 hour drive back. Dealer was honest and told me that the vehicle had 1 bad tire that he was willing to change. I appreciated that a lot. Most used car dealers would waste my time. I don't expect a perfect vehicle for $8000. But I damn sure good a good deal. Thank you guys for getting me in the car.

name: David Thorsby
text: Pleasure doing business. I was told about a battery before leaving the dealership. Changed it myself ($90) and I’m good to go! Dealer really priced his vehicle to sell. Happy overall

name: Savanna Silver
text: I found the best car here and would recommend friends families and strangers to shop here for first time buyer they work with you and they're real nice people I would definitely come here for my next car

name: Tonys Morris
text: I had the best experience with you guys. I really do appreciate you guys, and I will be referring my friends to you. You guys are wonderful. I’ve  bought many cars in my life and some were good some were night mares. Website has many detailed pictures. They let me put some money towards the car I wanted so it wouldn’t get sold until I got the rest of the money, that was a blessing! Thank you thank you thank you!

name: Gegory Hausler
text: Very happy with what this car lot was doing. Great business and we are happy to provide you with our future car needs (2 kids to go). Easy, n hassle and NOT PUSHY!

name: Trey Kingsley
text: I was very happy with my purchase. My dad was out of state and still managed to get my funds transferred over to me while Stallions held the car for me (with a small deposit). I spoke with Lee and felt like I was speaking to a friend, not a Salesperson. He was honest and told me what they car needed,tires. I knew it was a used car and it’s expected for it to need something minor like that. I respect that type of business. This was about 2 months ago, better late than never. And I did receive my title in the mail!

name: Rod Chesthill
text: I just came across stallions autos on a website called cargurus that had great deals and looked them up and saw some great reviews and I just purchased a 2011 bmw 3 series. I have to say I was not expecting this kind of service and treatment. These guys are selling cars in the customers best interest and they let me know some things that I didn’t know without asking. My nephew will be coming to see you guys in a few days so look out for him like you did me, and I’ll be back

name: jill coleman
text: 4 years later my car is still going strong. ill be coming by soon my sister needs a new car

name: sumar abukhudeer
text: Customers service is awesome and the perfect place if you’re a first time buyer. Highly recommend!

name: Josefina Kirkley
text: At first I didn’t like the front right  tire on the car that I drove for. The owner gave me $100 discount and I was pleased with that. Good used car for the money. Looked at several cash cars

name: kevin crosby
text: They didnt check my credit, although not a cash car I was financed in and out hassle free. Nice car with nice rims and tires. Thanks

name: Joe Impello
text: Nice selection of cars around $6000. Salesman greeted us and pointed out several options but was not overbearing. He checked in with us to answer some questions. We  were just looking and left without purchasing.

name: Maria Valdez
text: I did not want to put a down payment. I paid cash and got the best bang for my buck. Looked around and saw many roads leading me back here. Compared online prices. Satisfied

name: TAO CHENYU
text: thank you very much guys. I appreciate all help. nice meeting you. I love it

name: Joshua Northcutt
text: I don't recommend this place

name: Romero Alvaraz
text: I’ve lived all over the south east and I’m very familiar with non franchise car dealerships. With that being said, the profit margin these folks place on top of their vehicles has to be very very minimal based on their website prices. Ever car we inquired about we found cheaper here than anywhere else. Very transparent and very straight forward, they rely on selling quantity rather than a big mark up on a used car. They understand the market and have a great business model. I didn’t catch the owners but I wanted to say thanks and assure you that my family and I will not take our business elsewhere.

name: Emily Bowden
text: Almost had a heart attack when I first arrived and thought the vehicle I drove an hour for was sold. Although the sales person was sweet and advised me to put a deposit over the phone because their vehicles will quick, I took my chance. Anyways, it was parked out back and I got to it first :) *Quick change of mood*

name: Brittany Deflo
text: Just great. Very nice. Not pushy. Customer service was excellent. Provided all the information I asked for and needed. I got the 411 on a place that sells very cheap full coverage insurance. Im so grateful I found this place

name: Christie Downey
text:
Steer clear of this car lot! They sold us a car that they knew was for our 16 yr old daughter. We made it home and the next day the car would not shift into gear and then completely died. The owner did take our call and told us it was because a ground wire caused the transmission to stop working. We got the car to a local mechanic we use for everything who tested the car and said there are major electrical issues and multiple transmission codes. They knew this car was a lemon when the sold it to us. I get that used cars are a gamble but not the kind of issues this vehicle has. It's not even worth fixing. TRUST Me there is a reason their cars are priced so cheap. I'm sure not every car the sell is bad but they do sale junk cars/lemons.

BEWARE, Save your money.  You get what you pay for.

name: Jonas Knox
text: I was pleased to leave in a cash car and not have any payments. They showed me the true book value of what they sold me. Happy guy

name: JESSICA LAMONT
text: bought a used 2012 VW Jetta Diesel for my mother. She loves it

name: Tulip Chasity
text: I highly recommend this establishment. I had no hope in getting in a Mercedes with my credit although I had some money saved up. They got me in one by putting a good down payment and a decent monthly payment.

name: Kristia Jovid
text: Helpful and friendly guy. Car price is good. New tireS and drive very good.

name: KIMBERLY WALLIS
text: I just bought a beautiful Lexus , and this is my second car from there. My daughters driving my Honda I got from them 4 years ago. I have sent several of my friends there and everyone has been happy.

name: gary underwood
text: They have a big selection of nice cars reasonably priced for a buy here pay here. I was very satisfied with my purchase. Lee was a great help and made my car buying experience a breeze. He was willing to wait for me past closing hours for me to secure my vehicle! Straight forward man

name: Dave O'Shaughnessy
text: They sold us a lemon. The engine light came on, ON THE WAY HOME FROM THE LOT. Apparently they reset the engine light before they sold it to us. It had 4 different codes. The repairs to the transmission were $1,400. We’ve put another $500 into the exhaust system. Nobody from Stallion would ever call us back. Not to mention brakes and rotors were $400. Seems to me that they’re running a scam operation.

name: Hector Ricardo
text: Got a great price on a 15 Mercedes Benz. Well below market, I did my homework! Happy 19 year old Bday present

name: Michael Bryant
text: Worked my deal over the phone and the information was straight forward and my vehicle is running strong. Be sure to do your research on any used car but don't overlook Stallions. Thanks again Lee.

name: Cristie Shumaker
text: They gave us a fair price on a good vehicle. We didn't need anything fancy, just something solid. They had a Carfax and beat a nearby competitors price. Pleased, thanks

name: Gloria Richardson
text: Best bag for the buck. I’ve dealt with Stallions going on 10 years now.

name: peggy brenton
text: RESPONDED PROMPTLY, MADE IT TO THE LOT AND WAS GREETED. THE KEY FOR THE VEHICLE THAT I CAME TO PURCHASE WAS MISSING, ALMOST GAVE UP AND LEFT. ONCE IT WAS FOUND I TOOK IT FOR A SPIN AND PULLED RIGHT UP TO DO PAPERWORK. IT WAS WORTH MY WAIT TO GET A VEHICLE FOR A GOOD DEAL. PRICE MADE WAIT TIME NO PROBLEM

name: Alexis Brown
text: Very Great Car lot My car works Great and the people Are very nice and helpful  I Highly Recommend

name: donesha houston
text: I purchased a vehicle on last Thursday and was told at the time that all there vehicles are checked out by a mechanic before placing them on the lot for sale. A few days after I purchased the car I took it to the dealer to have serviced and they found multiple things including leakes from the valve cover gasket and oil filter housing also the oil was jet black and the inside of the oil filter was submerged due to the oil not being changed for a long time! They also had the wrong battery in the vehicle and the front breaks are metal to metal! I would not recommend anyone to purchase from this company!!

name: JAMIE PROTEGE
text: Stallions made my 3 and a half hour drive well worth it. I asked all my questions over the phone prior to making my drive from Lucedale, MS. I dealt with Lee. Very upfront and knowledgeable of what he was selling. Showed me great respect and didn't waste my time. I like to be in and out when buying a car. Best 6K that I've spent on any car so far

name: Lilkahtan
text: I got my BMW X3 and my uncle got a bmw 5 series’s  a year ago. Thank you Rick I will always deal with you guys. And I will recommend people to you. I love the way you guys run the business keep doing what you are doing. A+++

name: Jill Escott
text: Great car selection. Lovely staff. Bought my car a year ago. Just went back to get my brakes changed Cheaper than anywhere else I could find

name: Fernando Miguel
text: My family and me get a very nice truck. Clean title no problem. Good tire. Finance and no driver license. They send me to lendmark and my wife sign with me. Good dealar

name: Catelyn Joann
text: I drove up today may 25,2019 to check out a vehicle. This vehicle that, “claimed” to be great condition! Turned out to be a nightmare on the lot. They didn’t mention to me at all that the paint on this car was completely destroyed, not just tiny flakes here and there the paint peeling over 50% of this vehicle. We ended up passing on the vehicle the man working Rick was absolutely sweet is why I even handed this review a one star. Rick showed us another vehicle, dead battery but you know we thought, “maybe it’s just been on the lot a second”. Little jump start, and it fires right up. Problem one radio didn’t work, problem two the air wouldn’t even get cold. The biggest problem of them all is we tried to test drive this vehicle and the brakes sounded like steel on steel it was god awful. We didn’t even have second thoughts, we straight turned that vehicle around before we even got a second to pull it off the lot. Ridiculous because the photos that were used on Facebook didn’t show any detail of all of the paint job involved on this car. A waste of an hour drive to the location. Please know what your getting involved in on this lot.

name: Becky Sprawlig
text: Just drove off in my Malibu! Thank you Jesus! Thank you Stallions! thank you Rick! Love my new car!

name: jeremy little
text: My niece purchased a Honda 2 months ago. Car got totaled, came back for another. The sales person was helpful and gave us a good deal once we got the insurance check back. Very fair prices

name: Kyle Bishop
text: Called over the phone and set up a time to drive the cars I wanted and ended up driving off in the one in less than 45 minutes. I was very pleased with these young gentlemen’s hospitality

name: Alexis Kinsley
text: Talked to the young lady over the phone and came in a few days later and drove off without having to put a down payment financed through my credit union. Easiest transaction and very pleased with their fabulous customer service

name: JKL Automotive Repair
text: Pleased to do a quick cash sale with Lee. Needed an extra work truck for my company. Quick, easy and fair

name: Aaron Bennett
text: Found what I thought was a fair deal on a Nissan, ad and salesman said everything worked. The day after it went into "limp mode", code read MAF sensor, so I changed it out ( it had obviously been re-wired)...check engine light still on and still going into "limp mode". Took it back to dealer and they had their mechanic look at it, 3 days later they said it was running fine.. Check engine light still on and back to "limp mode" the next day. Online research says it could be a failing ECMb saleman told me that I will have to take it to the dealership to fix it.

name: Hamad Nawaz
text: Good spot for a reasonably price automobile.

name: Renae Hoskins
text: Good cash cars. Got on the phone and left them a voicemail and got a call back 19 minutes later. Will be shopping back here

name: Jennie&Frank Knight
text: We did good. Our little one was happy. Made a phone call, drive down and left with a car. All in 23 minutes lol

name: GRANDMLLLC COMPANY
text: Pleasure working with Lee, very straight forward and knowledgeable. Made my sons car purchasing experience a breeze. Also made my 3 hour drive well worth it.

name: pete seville
text: many cars to pick from, very low prices. and I have bad credit and I still got the car I wanted. highly recommended

name: Cordarius Boyd
text: Usefulled

name: Tasha Lewis
text: I cannot describe how happy me and my family are because of this place. I was treated like family or a friend. Every questioned I had was answered. Carfax was provided for free. (Another dealer tried to charge me for one). They were very patient with me test driving and encouraged me to do so. I just felt like they were Very honest people. Had nothing to hide. Very friendly. I can't say thank you enough. At the end of the day the car speaks for itself. But it's just nice to get great customer service

name: Terry Brown
text: I went last night and checked out the inventory on the lot and found a few vehicles I liked and a couple I didn't but these are used cars. Rick was very helpful as well as his brother and the gentleman on the lot. I fell in love with a 2012 Honda civic that was well below kbb estimated value. It had some paint issues but it's a solid driving vehicle. Great brakes,great tires,cold a.c.,heat,everything works great,no check engine lights. I'd definitely recommend this place to a friend!

name: Kels Griffin
text: Amazing dealership overall as well as people. I asked too many question lol about too many cars and they gave me all the info I asked for and more. I went to another dealership first and they tried to force me into certain car. Then I came here and they told me I can buy anything I want from the options they had lol. Not pushy or aggressive. I felt so welcomed. Thank you guys!!!

name: MICHAEL BEVIS
text: Thanks Lee. Did what he was supposed to do. 2012 VW (needed nothing but tires and a detail) for close to $2000 below market price. Pleasure doing business with you. 2 thumbs up

name: Michael Halbert
text: Don't trust these people at all!! In fact just stay away. I purchased a convertible from them about a few weeks ago and was assured that it did not leak anywhere. I washed the car as soon as I got home and there was a small bit of water on the inside right by the door. I figured it might be because the car was sitting still and I was directly spraying it with water, however I contacted the guy about it anyways. He said he would talk with one of his guys and get back to me.... It has now been several weeks and I havnt heard anything from him. Today (8/26) I got stuck in a heavy downpour and the top was leaking from every angle. I got to work and I was soaked and so was the inside of the car.
